title: Northern Lights set to dazzle UK this week due to possible 'Severe' geomagnetic storm
description: Activity on the surface of the Sun means the chance of the Northern Lights shining over the UK is high this week as Elizabeth Rizzini explains.
content:
There is a good chance of seeing the Northern Lights in the early hours of Wednesday or on Wednesday night in many parts of the UK.
That is because the Sun is going through an active phase experiencing a number of eruptions, called Coronal Mass Eject... [3634 chars]

title: ‘It’s notoriously hard to write about sex’: David Szalay on Flesh, his astounding Booker prize-winner
description: The novel’s protagonist is violent, libidinous and so inarticulate he says ‘OK’ some 500 times. So how did the author turn his story into a tragic masterpiece?
content: When we meet the morning after the announcement of this year’s Booker prize, David Szalay, the winner, seems an extremely genial and gentle author to have created one of the most morally ambiguous characters in recent contemporary fiction. His sixth ... [7982 chars]

title: Author Dame Jilly Cooper died after fall at home, inquest finds
description: The 88-year-old best-selling author died in hospital on 5 October, roughly 15 hours after her family found her after a fall at her home in Bisley, Gloucestershire. Her injuries were described as "catastrophic".
content:
Dame Jilly Cooper died from a head injury after falling at her home in Gloucestershire, an inquest has found.
Katy Skerrett, senior coroner for Gloucestershire, said the 88-year-old author "fell, perhaps down some stairs, sustaining a significant hea... [2767 chars]

title: More than 90 prisoners freed by mistake since April
description: The government publishes new figures for England and Wales, as it faces pressure over accidental releases.
content:
A total of 91 prisoners were freed by mistake between April and October this year, according to new government figures.
The data for England and Wales was published by the Ministry of Justice, as ministers face pressure over accidental releases after... [3888 chars]

title: Footballer Raheem Sterling suffers another break-in, while at home with family
description: The 30-year-old Chelsea star's luxury Berkshire home was targeted by intruders, who broke in at around 6.30pm on Saturday.
content:
Burglars have again broken into the home of former England footballer Raheem Sterling.
The 30-year-old Chelsea star was at home with his family when intruders got into the Berkshire property at around 6.30pm on Saturday.
